articles.author: Edith Olmsted
articles.title: Adult Film Star Sophia Leone Dead at 26 After Being Found Unresponsive - The Daily Beast
articles.description: Her stepfather said the investigation into her cause of death was still ongoing.
articles.content:
Adult film star Sophia Leone has died at 26 after being discovered unresponsive in her apartment earlier this month, according to The Daily Mail.

articles.title: Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2 Community Pays Tribute To Akira Toriyama - Nintendo Life
articles.description: "The Dragon Ball community united as one"
articles.content:
